verses.verse: To the chief Musician <S%H5329><s%> <S%H8764><s%> upon Shoshannimeduth <S%H7802><s%>, A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of Asaph <S%H623><s%>. Give ear <S%H238><s%> <S%H8685><s%>, O Shepherd <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, thou that leadest <S%H5090><s%> <S%H8802><s%> Yosef <S%H3130><s%> like a flock <S%H6629><s%>; thou that dwellest <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> between the cherubims <S%H3742><s%>, shine forth <S%H3313><s%> <S%H8685><s%>.

Before <S%H6440><s%> Efrayim <S%H669><s%> and Binyamin <S%H1144><s%> and M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%> stir up <S%H5782><s%> <S%H8786><s%> thy strength <S%H1369><s%>, and come <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%> and save <S%H3444><s%> us.
Turn us again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8685><s%>, O 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and cause thy face <S%H6440><s%> to shine <S%H215><s%> <S%H8685><s%>; and we shall be saved <S%H3467><s%> <S%H8735><s%>.
O YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>, how long wilt thou be angry <S%H6225><s%> <S%H8804><s%> against the prayer <S%H8605><s%> of thy people <S%H5971><s%> ?

Thou feedest <S%H398><s%> <S%H8689><s%> them with the bread <S%H3899><s%> of tears <S%H1832><s%>; and givest them tears <S%H1832><s%> to drink <S%H8248><s%> <S%H8686><s%> in great measure <S%H7991><s%>.
Thou makest <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> us a strife <S%H4066><s%> unto our neighbours <S%H7934><s%>: and our enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%> laugh <S%H3932><s%> <S%H8799><s%> among themselves.

Turn us again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8685><s%>, O 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>, and cause thy face <S%H6440><s%> to shine <S%H215><s%> <S%H8685><s%>; and we shall be saved <S%H3467><s%> <S%H8735><s%>.

Thou hast brought <S%H5265><s%> <S%H8686><s%> a vine <S%H1612><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: thou hast cast out <S%H1644><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, and planted <S%H5193><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it.

Thou preparedst <S%H6437><s%> <S%H8765><s%> room before <S%H6440><s%> it, and didst cause it to take deep <S%H8328><s%> root <S%H8327><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, and it filled <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>.
The hills <S%H2022><s%> were covered <S%H3680><s%> <S%H8795><s%> with the shadow <S%H6738><s%> of it, and the boughs <S%H6057><s%> thereof were like the goodly <S%H410><s%> cedars <S%H730><s%>.
She sent out <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8762><s%> her boughs <S%H7105><s%> unto the sea <S%H3220><s%>, and her branches <S%H3127><s%> unto the river <S%H5104><s%>.

Why hast thou then broken down <S%H6555><s%> <S%H8804><s%> her hedges <S%H1447><s%>, so that all they which pass <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8802><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> do pluck <S%H717><s%> <S%H8804><s%> her?
The boar <S%H2386><s%> out of the wood <S%H3293><s%> doth waste <S%H3765><s%> <S%H8762><s%> it, and the wild beast <S%H2123><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> doth devour <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it.

Return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, we beseech thee, O 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>: look down <S%H5027><s%> <S%H8685><s%> from heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and behold <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, and visit <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8798><s%> this vine <S%H1612><s%>;

And the vineyard <S%H3657><s%> <S%H3661><s%> <S%H8798><s%> which thy right hand <S%H3225><s%> hath planted <S%H5193><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and the branch <S%H1121><s%> that thou madest strong <S%H553><s%> <S%H8765><s%> for thyself.

It is burned <S%H8313><s%> <S%H8803><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>, it is cut down <S%H3683><s%> <S%H8803><s%>: they perish <S%H6><s%> <S%H8799><s%> at the rebuke <S%H1606><s%> of thy countenance <S%H6440><s%>.
Let thy hand <S%H3027><s%> be upon the man <S%H376><s%> of thy right hand <S%H3225><s%>, upon the son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> whom thou madest strong <S%H553><s%> <S%H8765><s%> for thyself.
So will not we go back <S%H5472><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from thee: quicken <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8762><s%> us, and we will call <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon thy name <S%H8034><s%>.

Turn us again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8685><s%>, O YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>, cause thy face <S%H6440><s%> to shine <S%H215><s%> <S%H8685><s%>; and we shall be saved <S%H3467><s%> <S%H8735><s%>.
